greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Second coordinate in a barycentric coordinate system of the points of a counterclockwise spiral on an hexagonal grid. First and third coordinates are given in A307011 and A307013.
comment: The second coordinate makes a 60 degree angle with the first (horizontal) coordinate.
link: Hugo Pfoertner, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10150
Index entries for sequences related to coordinates of 2D curves
